productionSqlExpression:
SELECT 
  LTRIM(RTRIM(h.ship2_city)) AS location,
  COUNT(DISTINCT h.order_no) AS total_orders
FROM oe_hdr AS h
WHERE h.ship2_city LIKE N'%Addison%'
GROUP BY LTRIM(RTRIM(h.ship2_city))
ORDER BY total_orders DESC;
calculationType: Count distinct orders shipped to the specified geographical location.

productionSqlExpression: SELECT LTRIM(RTRIM(h.ship2_city)) AS location, COUNT(DISTINCT h.order_no) AS total_orders FROM oe_hdr AS h WHERE h.ship2_city LIKE N'%Columbus%' GROUP BY LTRIM(RTRIM(h.ship2_city)) ORDER BY total_orders DESC;
calculationType: Count distinct orders shipped to the specified geographical location.

productionSqlExpression: SELECT LTRIM(RTRIM(h.ship2_city)) AS location, COUNT(DISTINCT h.order_no) AS total_orders FROM oe_hdr AS h WHERE h.ship2_city LIKE N'%LakeCity%' GROUP BY LTRIM(RTRIM(h.ship2_city)) ORDER BY total_orders DESC;
calculationType: Count distinct orders shipped to the specified geographical location.
